Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 41st overall pick, by Washington in 2007...
Injured on 8/11/2009 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 7-8 weeks...
Traded from Washington to Minnesota on 2/23/2013 (Going to MIN: P J. Hellickson, P A. Alcazar, LF J. Martinez, LF D. Muñoz, C D. Norris. Going to WSH: P S. Marshall, SS R. Rohlinger)...
Injured on 5/23/2015 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Released by Minnesota on 1/31/2016...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/7/2016 to a 1-year deal worth $1,001,001 per year...
Injured on 5/25/2016 with a Broken Ribs, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 6/21/2020 with a Sore Knee, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 6/5/2022, off Kip Atkin (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/6/2022, off Jeremy Hellickson (TOR)...
